page.syntax: C result = js_list_to_array(list as C [,listIsCommaDelimited as L])

argument.name: list
argument.description: list string parameter to populate array from

argument.name: listIsCommaDelimited
argument.description: Logical. If true, delimit with commas instead of cr-lfs.

page.description: Takes a CR-LF delimited list of values and generates a string in Javascript array syntax.
page.example:
? js_list_to_array("alpha,beta,gamma",.t.) = "['alpha','beta','gamma']"
? js_list_to_array("alpha,bet a,gamma",.t.) = "['alpha','bet a','gamma']"
dim list as c list = <<%txt% alpha beta gamma %txt%
'list is crlf delimited, so second optional argument is not used ? js_list_to_array(list) = "['alpha','beta','gamma']"
